title: OpenGL Demo Framework
description: Framework for testing and demonstrating different OpenGL rendering techniques including a model loader, terrain renderer and interactive components with ImGui.

title: Interactive Geometry Remeshing
description: A Python implementation of Pierre Alliez, Mark Meyer, and Mathieu Desbrun's research paper "Interactive Geometry Remeshing."

title: Creativity Support Tools
description: Portfolio of work done for my class, CSC485E; "Topics in Systems: Creativity Support Tools." Features a series of projects based around tangible user interfaces and supporting creative processes.

title: Python .obj Viewer
description: 3D graphics using only python with NumPy and Pygame. Allows for viewing of simple .obj files without the aid of any 3D graphics APIs.

title: SFML Raycaster
description: Simple Raycaster with made C++ and SFML. Handles basic player-object collisions, textured wall rendering and features a mini-map demonstrating the casting of rays.

title: Isometric Platformer
description: Simple framework for an isometric style platformer, coded in Python using Pygame.

title: Arduino R2R DAC
description: Resistor-ladder digital to analog convertor made with arduino uno. Made to generate various analog waveforms using only digital outputs; sine, saw, square etc.

title: Algorithmic Trader with Text-Alerts
description: Program using RSI-based trading strategy that sends text-alerts for buy/sell signals using the Twilio SMS API.
